thread.title: the good way to stay in London -
thread.title_full: the good way to stay in London - Review of Point A Hotel, London Paddington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Gilberto Luiz O
title: the good way to stay in London -
text: Our experience at Point A was very good. For acessible price, we have an amazing time in London, with good rooms, nice people, good service, estrategic localization, and all the good adjectives you can attribute to a trip with you family. No regrets, only smiles.
